website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Carl Zeiss Sonnar T* FE 55mm F1.8 ZA captures sharp, lovely images, but it's not a budget lens.
pros: Extremely sharp from edge to edge

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic the best lens I have ever add.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, you need how to learn how to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: GREGOIRE

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Having previously owned and sold a 55mm lens... I went back to buy this beauty as it is such a good all rounder. Small, lightweight, sharp. AF makes it a good lens also, if a little narrow FL. A true classic Sony lens that will stand the test of time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: Such a brilliant lens
customer_reviews.text: We had this at my previous job and when I went freelance, I knew I wanted to get this lens. Beautiful images and you can feel the quality of it. After 10 months still so happy with this lens, absolutely worth the price. I try to use this lens for as many shots as I can, usually try to shoot all the B-roll with it, even though it's not a zoomlens and only switch it out if absolutely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: AndyM

customer_reviews.title: The sharpest
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing lens, sharp even when its wide open. very light weight! it does get scratched easily so need to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: A truly must have for the system!
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential lens for the system if you love primes. Fast, sharp and has a lovely colour to the images from the Zeiss glass. A keeper this one. Highly recommend this to Sony FE users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lens
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this lens a huge amount but for the amount I have used it the image quality is really good and focus is really good paired with a7riii
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reid

customer_reviews.title: Lovely on my a7
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised by how good this lens is. I come from Canon and L lenses and despite not being as fast on my Sony a7 as a 100 f2.8L on my Canon 5dMKII when focusing, it does a good job. The bokeh is lovely and it is razor sharp. I just received Sony's cashback so I'm really happy with the lens for the price. The hood is awesome, it is easy to snap-in as opposed to canon's. It comes with a leather pouch which is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael RianchoFernández

customer_reviews.title: Great prime lens!
customer_reviews.text: Great lens, I'm currently using it on a A7 and it works very good! Pro: Great bokeh, very sharp, amazing colors and details, light weight compared the other E mount lenses. Cons: AF is not a lightening and there are some aberrations at F1.8. It is no cheap (but you will forget after few photos). With the SEL90M28G is one of my favorite lenses. A must have for the sony mirrorless.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant lens
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lenses for Sony A7 lll gives really sharp pictures
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Superb Zeiss Optics
customer_reviews.text: Zeiss,Sony G or G Master the benchmark to beat. E Mount Inuse with full frame sensor also works with APS-C. Had Zeiss lenses on our Hasselblad. A Camera is let down by poor optics. This won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: EMRYS  MYRDDIN WYLLT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing. Marvel of engineering and one of the very ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharpest lens I've ever used. Absolutely amazing. Marvel of engineering and one of the very few modern things that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul from Aberdeen

customer_reviews.title: The most wonderful lens, Incredibly sharp (see the DxO report on ...
customer_reviews.text: The most wonderful lens, Incredibly sharp (see the DxO report on the dpreview site) and on my Sony A7ii focusses fast and accurately. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing lens. Very fast and delivering pin-sharp images
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing lens. Very fast and delivering pin-sharp images. I love it's size and weight. Sits perfectly on my Alpha7rii. Pricey but well worth the money for the image quality. It came nextday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One sharp lens
customer_reviews.text: Fanatstic lens, every bit as good as the reviews. Sharp across the frame and produces beautiful images.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have the sony a7ii + 70-200 f4. Getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the sony a7ii + 70-200 f4. Getting this lense i must admit that the af is blazing fast!
customer_reviews.author: ivo

customer_reviews.title: best nifty fifty
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite lens of all time. Light, fast, accurate AF and sharp even on 1.8. Have been a canon user for long years ( over 10 ) used sigma 50mm, canon mk1, mk2 50m, also 50/1.2L - but this lens leaves them all behind ( probably bokeh, quality close to 50/1.2L - but much lighter and cheaper ). Love this lens with my a7r2, or even on my a6000 - no question at all. Personally don't think the recently released sony FE 50/1.2 for 1500USD will make much sense when we have this lens around for 1/3rd of the price and a very compact size.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and light, great on my A7R. Now added to my Sony kit along with the 35mm f2.8 FE. My tip when buying is to keep an eye on 'Camera price buster'. I got this from Amazon when they had it for the best price for an official Sony UK import. That along with £100 cash back from Sony in January made for a much better priced lens. Now if Sony were to produce an equally good 16 and 24mm prime that would be great, no bulky or lesser quality zooms for me.
customer_reviews.author: jeep

customer_reviews.title: Specacular quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the finest lenses I've ever used - spectacular sharpness, and a perfect companion to my Sony A7.
customer_reviews.author: Haje Jan Kamps

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lenses I've ever used, and I've used a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said this was a good lens, but I wasn't really prepared to fall in love with it so quickly. Razor sharp at F1.8, and the way the image jumps out at you is incredible. Even friends have commented how amazing everything looks just on the tiny camera LCD. It's a fantastic lens.
customer_reviews.author: The Demon Barber

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was horrible as it was done by UPS (it was mentioned ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was horrible as it was done by UPS (it was mentioned delivered when it wasn't, as it was passed to the other shipping companies to deliver it to a much more isolated island, thus tracking isn't available, and once the other shipping company signed for the package, it can't be claimed/tracked anymore, hence it arrived weeks later than the appointed date.) Sharp lens as mentioned in most of the comments! Even though I'm an amateur at photography, the pictures taken were really smooth and bright, great apperture and shutter speed for amazing night photography/astrograph! Also loving the build quality, nice solid slick and "trusty" piece of art! :D
customer_reviews.author: ToryToryDor

customer_reviews.title: Best lens to buy for your Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: Best lens to buy for your Sony camera. Beats anything out there, if you can justify the price that is. No, but really, very very sharp, great contrast, good colour rendition, light weight, AF, really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Attila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Lens!! Sharp in every wide open aperture. Beautiful bouquet. Great built, rugged metal.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnington

customer_reviews.title: Some say this is the sharpest lens for the prosumer mkt.. They might be right
customer_reviews.text: I have the Sony A7r and have found the canon glass and metabones adapter to be to unreliable. The camera is much happier with this lens. IQ and build quality are truly superb. It's a lot of money but completes a high spec camera system.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mclellan

customer_reviews.title: SONY SEL55F F/1.8 Z AE 55MM
customer_reviews.text: Truly a great lens and very sharp so the price is well justified. The only slight drawback is that you are stuck with that 55mm but then it is a prime lens after all. It is well constructed and probably one of the best lenses I have used to date.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing lens, helps me capture details that would otherwise be missed.
customer_reviews.author: Richardphoto dot co dot uk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lens. I just need to figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lens. I just need to figure out how to get the best out of it. Took some stunning (sharp/contrasty) shots and there are tons of gorgeous photo shoots with this lens so the potential is there
customer_reviews.author: Paul Costache

customer_reviews.title: noticeable aperture noise
customer_reviews.text: Overall good performance but strong scary aperture noise. Returned. I own Sony 85 1.8 and when I use it there isn't a noise at all.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this lens
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this lens!! Delivery is another issue. When placing the order, I was advised the delivery would be on Thursday which was fine. However, shortly after placing order, I was informed the delivery would be a day earlier (Wed). This caused me to cancel an appointment I had on that Wed. There was no indication of when the delivery would take place (am-pm). I waited in ALL DAY. The parcel was delivered at 8-45pm!!!! This procedure needs revision. More delivery info would be a big plus. I am now reluctant to order anything that won't fit through the letterbox!
customer_reviews.author: snapper

customer_reviews.title: Incredible lens
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sharp. Incredibly light. Incredibly lovely colour rendition. Incredibly fast AF. Goes incredibly well with the new Incredible Sony a7r
customer_reviews.author: mallyg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lens!
customer_reviews.text: By far my best companion to the Sony A7rII! Hardly ever go off the camera! Is very sharp at 1.8, produce amazing colours, and this Carl Zeiss optics does magic with depth of your photos! Highly recommended for portrait, street and low light photography!
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance.
customer_reviews.text: This glass is excellent. It produces clear and sharp fotos. With e.g. the Sony A7R you need to consider the full frame at 36 Mpixel, so better do photos on a tripod or at > 125 sec. to achieve the best results. It adds to the before mentioned recommendation that the lens is not stabilised. But again, I have not seen such amazing performance on any other lens, it seems to be made for the Sony A7s.
customer_reviews.author: Horst Wulf

customer_reviews.title: Killer lens but can't justify it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Killer lens but can't justify it for the price. So many other options out there that deliver 90% of this lens for half the price
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: amazing edge to edge sharpness
customer_reviews.text: amazing edge to edge sharpness. great resolution. very useable wide open at f1.8 infact best i have seen in any lens wide open. little vignetting that could see. I knocked off a star as the focus rings collects dust and bits as does the interior of the hood. but that's mr being picky. all in all on a A7r or A7s it's a challenger to medium format in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Checker T

customer_reviews.title: Moving back to Sony I thought I'd buy it again but was so disappointed with this particular copy that it was returned as ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this lens before with my previous a7 / a7r. Moving back to Sony I thought I'd buy it again but was so disappointed with this particular copy that it was returned as faulty. I tested it at the wider apertures but it was soft. I know from experience and other reviews that this shouldn't be the case which lead me to question Sony's QC.
customer_reviews.author: Zepp2010

product_meta.title: Sony SEL55F18Z.AE 55mm f/1.8 ZA Lens - Black
product_meta.description:
Sony SEL55F18Z.AE 55mm f/1.8 ZA Lens - Black. Maximum magnification ratio is 0.14x and the viewing angle is 43°. When wiping the dirt off, be careful to keep dust or debris from getting inside the camera body or the lens. Take care not to touch the lens surface. Do not use force but wipe lightly so as not to put pressure on the contacts of the body.

BOX CONTAINS
Case
Hood (ALC-SH131)
feature_bullets: 55 mm, F1.8, 35 mm full-frame E-mount prime lens with a large 9 blade aperture
Crafted with Carl Zeiss Sonnar T* optics
Minimum focus distance : 0.5m (1.64ft), Focal Length (mm) : 55 mm

specifications.Style: Camera with 55 mm F1.8 Prime Lens
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars252 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
